# atumscot

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

To reproduced code in this repository run the following command (requires dependencies and data to be present):

```{r, eval=FALSE}
targets::tar_make()
```

Visualise the project as follows:

```{r visnet}
targets::tar_visnetwork(targets_only = TRUE)
```

The zones in the case study region are as follows:

```{r zones, echo=FALSE}
# knitr::include_graphics("figures/test-plot.png")
tm_shape(zones) +
  tm_polygons(col = "TotPop2011", palette = "viridis")
```
